permissions: Allowed for users who can access project categories in scope; non-admins only see categories for brokers they are members of.
validation_notes: Filters: name and abbreviation use case-insensitive partial match; q searches name and abbreviation with case-insensitive partial match. Broker filter matches broker id.

flags.name: --name
flags.description: Filter by name (partial match, case-insensitive; e.g., "Paving").

flags.name: --q
flags.description: General search across name and abbreviation (e.g., "concrete").
flags.validation: Case-insensitive partial match across name and abbreviation.
